Hidden Threats.description: You have met Corym Servant. He told you the true story of enslaved corym working under terrible conditions. You have agreed to help him planing a riot. First you have to liberate his comrades.

Lion's Rock.description: You have passed the three tests of Lion's Rock and thus lit the three mystical pyramids. You may enterthe inner sanctum now. - What other secrets could be hidden down there?
